TopicTitle: I had a weird dream playing Ksp 2

Articles.Content: Does anyone have a weird dream playing ksp 1 or 2. I recently have a dream flying the jet seeing flashing yellow orbs on kerbin surface.

10 minutes ago, tkw said:

Does anyone have a weird dream playing ksp 1 or 2. I recently have a dream flying the jet seeing flashing yellow orbs on kerbin surface.

I dreamt that ksp2 finally came out once.

i had a very weird dream about ksp about 2 years ago where a kerbal was dropped from space an burnt up in kerbins athmosphere but instad of having the normal death animationwhere it turns to smoke it turned into a few bones that where burnt and landed at the grass around the ksc. it was very weird and lasted only a few seconds
I had a dream in the ksp 2 vab.
